name: Mapfia
tag_list: lbs, iphone, android, google-latitude, loopt, location-sharing-apps, google-map-coordinates
overview:
Mapfia is an application for iPhone and Android phones that lets you make free “map calls”. When you call another Mapfia user and the call is answered, you can see each other’s real time location on a map.

”Need to share your location…I don’t think I’ve seen an easier method than Mapfia” - GigaOM

”As check-ins and similar features become a more frequent feature of social media…Mapfia is taking the initiative to offer users more control over their data.” - Springwise.com

Why Mapfia? Come on, do you really want your friends and coworkers to see your location 24/7 once you accept their friend requests? Do you have the time to send an SMS or an email to get directions when you are lost or running late? You need a simple and secure way to share location, and that’s where we come in. With Mapfia, you can see each other’s location just by making a quick phone call, and once you hang up, that’s it! It only shares your location privately while you are on the call. Mapfia also integrates seamlessly with your existing address book and does not require a PIN or username.

Our goal is to make navigation and location sharing easy and secure with our patented technology.
